sentences.en: a vase on a side table caught his eye.
sentences.cn: 墙边桌上的一个花瓶吸引了他的视线。

sentences.en: Anton caught malaria in Mali, and nearly died.
sentences.cn: 安东在马里染上疟疾，差点丢了性命。

sentences.en: Auditors caught up with the embezzler.
sentences.cn: 查帐员查出了那个侵占公款者

sentences.en: Did you catch any fish?
sentences.cn: 你捕到鱼了吗？

sentences.en: Early settlers caught rabbits and squirrels and even rats in order to survive.
sentences.cn: 早期移民为了生存而捕食野兔、松鼠，甚至老鼠。

sentences.en: Eddie slipped the safety catch on his automatic back into place.
sentences.cn: 埃迪将自动步枪的保险栓重新拉上。

sentences.en: Globalisation is a catch-all to describe increased international trade.
sentences.cn: “全球化”是个泛称，用以描述增进了的国际贸易。

sentences.en: he caught Eva's eye and beckoned.
sentences.cn: 他捕捉到伊娃的眼神，并向她示意。

sentences.en: He stopped and let her catch up with him.
sentences.cn: 他停下来，好让她追上自己。

sentences.en: He was caught red-handed (= as he was doing something wrong ) taking money from the cash register.
sentences.cn: 他从现金出纳机偷钱时被当场抓住。

sentences.en: Her voice was so low he had to strain to catch it.
sentences.cn: 她的声音很低，他很费力才听得到。

sentences.en: I caught the 7.15 train to London.
sentences.cn: 我赶上了7点15分的火车去伦敦。

sentences.en: I didn't so much as catch sight of him all day long.
sentences.cn: 我一整天都没见他人影。

sentences.en: I do not believe I caught your name.
sentences.cn: 我想我没听清你的名字。

sentences.en: I must catch up on my correspondence.
sentences.cn: 我必须尽快写完我的回信

sentences.en: I stopped and waited for her to catch up.
sentences.cn: 我停住脚步，等她追上来。

sentences.en: I was caught up in the mood of the evening.
sentences.cn: 我沉醉在夜晚的情调中

sentences.en: Let me catch you up on all the gossip.
sentences.cn: 让我把所有的流言蜚语简要地说给你

sentences.en: Let's dry our hair so we don't catch cold.
sentences.cn: 我们把头发吹干，这样就不会感冒。

sentences.en: Many young people are still ignorant about how HIV is caught.
sentences.cn: 许多年轻人对艾滋病病毒是如何染上的仍然一无所知。

sentences.en: Most late developers will catch up with their friends.
sentences.cn: 大多数身材发育迟缓者都会赶上他们的朋友。

sentences.en: Police say they are confident of catching the gunman.
sentences.cn: 警方说他们有信心抓获枪手。

sentences.en: Press the lever until you hear the catch engage.
sentences.cn: 压下挡杆，直到听到挡挂好。

sentences.en: She was going to Nanaimo to catch the ferry to the mainland.
sentences.cn: 她准备去纳奈莫乘渡船回大陆。

sentences.en: She was running to catch a red-eye to New York.
sentences.cn: 她急着去赶飞往纽约的红眼航班。

sentences.en: Skateboarding caught on quickly.
sentences.cn: 滑板运动很快就流行起来

sentences.en: Sorry, I didn't quite catch what you said.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我没听清楚你的话。

sentences.en: The mugger caught the wallet up and fled.
sentences.cn: 匪徒抢了钱夹并逃走了

sentences.en: The vessels will have to land their catch at designated ports.
sentences.cn: 船只必须在指定的港口把捕到的鱼卸下。

sentences.en: The white sails billow with the breezes they catch.
sentences.cn: 一张张白帆随着微风舞动。

sentences.en: They skip rope and play catch, waiting for the bell.
sentences.cn: 他们又是跳绳，又是玩接球，等着上课铃声响起。

sentences.en: was caught up in the scandal.
sentences.cn: 涉及丑闻

sentences.en: We were in plenty of time for Anthony to catch the ferry.
sentences.cn: 我们有足够的时间等安东尼搭上渡船。

sentences.en: You wouldn't catch me in there, I can tell you.
sentences.cn: 我可以告诉你，你永远别想在那里看见我。

words.tran_cn: 引人注意的；容易记住的；易使人上当的

phrases.tran_cn: 打捞工具；选择全部；设立预设帐号
试图抓住；死命抓住；渴望获得
发觉自己讲错而突然住嘴
侦测错误：侦测（另一人）正在犯错的行为或过程
使接近：将一项工作引向接近完成

trans.tran_cn: 接，扣件，隐患，总捕获量，如意伴侣，抛接球游戏

trans.tran_en: to stop someone after you have been chasing them and not let them get away

trans.tran_cn: 接住，抓住，当场抓住，捕捉，得病，及时赶上，听见，去做某事，击中
trans.tran_en: to see someone doing something that they did not want you to know they were doing

trans.tran_cn: 抓住， 握住； 赶上； 引起； 染上， 感染； 偶然撞见， 偶然发觉； 听清楚， 领会
trans.tran_en: to see someone doing something that they did not want you to know they were doing
